explanations.machine learning: The paper focuses on the use of machine learning (ML) for farm risk management (FRM), discussing various ML methods and their applications.
explanations.supervised learning: The paper mentions supervised learning as one of the ML types used in FRM.
explanations.reinforcement learning: The paper identifies reinforcement learning as a potential advanced ML method for future studies in FRM.
explanations.classification: The paper lists classification as one of the addressed ML tasks in FRM.
explanations.regression: The paper mentions regression modeling as one of the ML algorithms used in FRM.
explanations.deep learning: The paper highlights the significant increase in employing deep learning methods for FRM.
explanations.neural network: The paper discusses neural networks, including deep learning and convolutional neural networks, as part of ML methods used in FRM.
explanations.convolutional neural network: The paper specifically mentions convolutional neural networks (CNNs) as one of the ML methods employed for FRM.
explanations.CNN: The paper refers to convolutional neural networks (CNNs) as part of the ML methods used in FRM.
